translation: Sanjaya said: Having seen the army of the Pandavas drawn up in battle array, King Duryodhana approached his teacher, Drona, and spoke these words.
commentary: 1.2 Seeing having seen? You indeed? Pandavanikam the army of the Pandavas? Vyudham drawn up in battlearray? Duryodhana: Duryodhana? Then then? Acharyam the teacher? approaching having approached? King the king? Word speech? Abravit said.No Commentary.
